args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Defective Harness May Cause Loss of Drive Power

PACCAR Incorporated (PACCAR) is recalling certain 2024-2025 Peterbilt Model 220, Kenworth K270, and K370 Medium-Duty Battery Electric Vehicles.  The cradle harness may have a loose electrical connection that can cause a loss of drive power.A loss of drive power increases the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 42.0"
